Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MAX>
...Some people think our lady's selfish. I don't.

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
...Our lady's still young. Mentally, I mean.

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
...Deep down, I think our lady's got a good
heart.

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
...Our lady's gotten a lot nicer these days. That's
a good thing.

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
...Right from the start, I knew our lady was just
acting out because she was lonely.

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
...Our lady loves flowers. No one who loves
flowers could be an evil person, could they?
